body:
I don't like the fact that we are adding yet another place where we emit a if node manually, can we refactor emitTernaryIf and this to use a common helper, something like:

```
Value* emitIfExpr(Value* expr, std::function<Value*()> true_expr,  std::function<Value*()> false_expr);
```
body_html:
